description: Dyna Blade is a legendary, ancient creature, revered for her mysticism. She lives on a tall peak far away from Cappy Town. She is extremely protective of her chicks, and will go out of her way to ensure their safety, and will willfully destroy anything in her way to do so. Her breath weapon is a cone of gale force wind, and she`s known for her destructive speed.
name: Dyna Blade
